name: Evangeline™
description: Evangeline™ is a short first person experience (FPX) where color guides you through the world. At the end, you have to ask yourself one simple question: If you could make one last call to a loved one, what would you say?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB GPU Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3GHz+ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4 GB GPU Storage: 2 GB available space
